casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Negley, Appellant.
Submitted. March 15, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Alexander Negley, appellant, in propria persona.
Robert F. Hawk and David L. Cook, Assistant District Attorneys, and John H. Brydon, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
June 1, 1971:
